basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Shigella flexneri ATCC 203 (MIC=0.98 µg/ml), Proteus vulgaris OX19 ATCC 6380 (MIC=7.8 µg/ml), Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=3.9 µg/ml), Psedomonas aeruginosa OT 97 (MIC=7.8 µg/ml).Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megateriun B11 (MIC=1.9 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=1.95 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus JC-1 (MIC=7.8 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus Ml 11 (MIC=10 µg/ml).
